response.job_title: Engineering Training & Product Support | Machinery | Automotive | Construction | Agriculture | Forklift
response.summary:
M. Sc. in mechanical engineering with 9 years of experience in technical support and warranty claims of automotive, construction and agricultural equipments. Changan brand: Representative of claims and service costumer, fleet managment and training. Nissan Brand: Commercial Instructor leading and support enginner in Nissan dealers. New Holland Brand: Training and product support in New Holland Construction & Agriculture. Unicarriers lifting equipments: Training and product support.
Leadership and training in technical enviromentals. Webinar instructor, creator of e-learning courses. Fleet Managment , key quality index, service bulletins, improvement programs of product. Head of Product supporting.
Certification in "Reading and interpretation of hydraulic and electric circuits". New Holland.
response.skills: Aptitudes de organización, Sector automovilístico, Investigación y desarrollo, Matlab, Simulaciones, ANSYS, Estadística, Ingeniería mecánica, Ciencias, Educación superior, Programación, LaTeX, C++, Modelos matemáticos, Inglés, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Office, Vehículos eléctricos

profile_positions.description: Product Training in New Holland Construction brand, New Holland Agriculture. Lifting Equipments Unicarriers, Haulotte. Responsible for DINISSAN Operator's Club whose objective is to build a brand beginning with lectures, and training to machinery operators and customers at no cost. Product quality monitoring, feedback with headquarters, and technical service reports. Technical support across all business cores. Implementation of the training needs matrix in the machinery area. Development of junior positions in the service area.
profile_positions.title: Head of Product Support and Engineering

profile_positions.description:
• Technical & commercial product training for national sales and after sales network in
Nissan Colombia.
• Technical product support in fleet, Corporate, B2B and tender business
• Launched seven new Nissan vehicles training all over the country.
Performed sustain increasing in product certification of sales force for salesman
categorization.
• Performed, launched and training for sustainable e-mobility projects based on Nissan
Leaf.
• Scheduled and taught in class and online courses to increase sales, satisfaction
customer index (SCI).
• Drove continuous improvement culture in training team to provide clear product
attributes , improve knowledge, sales and reducing claims.
• Lead, recruited and trained six new members of junior engineering team.
profile_positions.title: Nissan Engineer product and training

profile_positions.description:
• Prepared and distributed daily reports on crews, milestones, issues, and progress.
• Analyzed survey reports, specifications, maps and topography data for product
planning and development.
• Utilized best practices and troubleshooting techniques to resolve vehicle issues.
• Worked closely with other personnel including design staff and VP of engineering to
help achieve successful product launch.
• Technical training to Service Network.
• Executing purchase orders of vehicle fleets.
• Quality and Warranty Product Specialist of Changan brand.
• Management of customer fleet availability in aftersales.
profile_positions.title: Fleet engineer & Corporate Customer claims

profile_positions.description: Responsible of the C.V.R (Constant Volume Reactor) in the LabCET (Laboratory of Combustion and Thermal Sciences). The C.V.R project is embebed into the formulation of fuels for automotive application and civil aviation research area. The main objective is measuring of laminar burning velocity and flamability limits for development of surrogates for gasoline and diesel. .
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant

profile_positions.description:
-Development of training materials for company education.
- Technical Product Support in Fleet, Corporate, B2B and tender business. 
HQ Comunication and training with Changan International Corporation in order to develop training strategies, ensuring quality product and warranty claim management.
profile_positions.title: Warranty Engineer

profile_positions.description: Assistant Professor of mathematical modelling in bachelor mechanical & mechatronics enginerring.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Professor

profile_positions.description: Developing of flame simulation manual in Ansys Fluent. Benchmarking study presentation for combustion lectures.
profile_positions.title: Internship
